subject: Career
title: Setting Boundaries When Home Is the Office
description: A fast breakdown of Setting Boundaries When Home Is the Office for builders.

hook.text: Your bedroom is your office. Your office is your bedroom. No wonder you can't sleep thinking about work.

buildup.text: Boundary theory: humans need physical and psychological borders between work and personal life.

discovery.text: Without commute, there's no transition ritual. Your brain can't switch between 'work mode' and 'home mode.'

twist.text: Creating a 'fake commute' â€” a walk before and after work â€” restores the psychological boundary.

climax.text: Physical separation (dedicated desk), time separation (fixed hours), and ritual separation (shutdown routine) all help.

punchline.text: If you don't set the boundary, work will fill every corner of home.

quiz.question: What is a 'fake commute' in remote work?
options: A walk before and after work to create a psychological transition
Pretending to be at the office
